Fix dim bug

Repoduce Steps:
1. set widget mode
2. click icon to dim
3. press notification to launch app
4. touch to adjust to 100
5. back to home and click icon to dim
Result: step 5 will not total dim
Root Cause: enter dim must clear mWindowParams.screenBrightness to -1 to
ensure screen brightness to lowest
reduce memory usage when app is inactive except for auto mode
do not suicide when app is foreground

Fix bug: Can not restore original brightness state.

Reproduce steps: Set system auto brightness. Launch app to switch dim
(WidgetMode OFF) and return bright by closing notification. System
brightness would be lowest.

Control collectState flag to get real original setting.

Force reset collectState flag, cause auto mode won't suicide.
Force set collectState flag after dim, to prevent launch app to collect state again.
